sentences.english: The newspaper made a first salary, I go back home.
sentences.chinese: 到報社發了第一筆工資後，我徑自回了家。

sentences.english: A friendly manatee may swim right up and touch your face with his.
sentences.chinese: 一頭友好的海牛可能會徑自遊向你，然後和你貼面。

sentences.english: He walked into the room unbidden.
Mrs. Wolowitz: She ran past me.
But three seconds later I’m gone, never to return again.
sentences.chinese: 可是三秒鐘後我徑自離開，再不回頭看上一眼。

sentences.english: He therefore entered, without ceremony, and groped his way to the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他於是顧不得禮節，徑自入門，摸索着去廚房的路。

sentences.english: I bypass her, the without acquainting anyone muggy head drinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不理會她，徑自悶頭喝酒。

sentences.english: Put 54 pistols in the small of the back, without telling anyone come forward to carry two bodyguards.
sentences.chinese: 把五四手槍插在後腰，徑自上前拎住兩個保鏢。

sentences.english: And without another word to her, he pushed his way out of the portrait hole.
sentences.chinese: 他沒再跟她說話，徑自擠出了肖像洞口。

sentences.english: He was whistling "Come, Lasses and Lads."
sentences.chinese: 他正徑自吹着口哨，“來吧，姑娘們和小夥子們。”

sentences.english: For an instant he feared lest, instead of keeping in shore, she should stand out to sea;
sentences.chinese: 一時間，他怕那帆船不沿岸航行，而徑自駛出海去。
